## Overfitting 

```{r,eval=F}
install.packages("keras")
```

```{r}
library(keras)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(tibble)
```

```{r}
num_words <- 10000
imdb <- dataset_imdb(num_words = num_words)
```
